description: Destroy all opposing Spying non-Gold units on the battlefield.
flavorText: I'll take an attentive reconnaissance unit over a fine brigade any day.
name: Menno Coehoorn

description: Add 4 strength to all non-Gold units on a row.
flavorText: Plus one to morale, minus one to hearing.
name: Commander's Horn

description: Ambush: When a revealed non-Gold unit appears on the opposing side, remove 3 strength from it and spawn a Commando Neophyte on a random row on your side.
flavorText: Careful…! One more step and you'll be turned into molten glass.
name: Fireball Trap

description: Lock a non-Gold unit on the battlefield. A locked unit loses all tokens (Resilience, Quen, etc.) and its ability does not trigger while it remains on the battlefield.
flavorText: Letho's got a plan… what could go wrong?
name: Auckes

description: Discard up to 3 cards from your deck and add 1 base strength to them. Then shuffle your deck.
flavorText: No one can replace Bran. Though they're sure to try.
name: King Bran

description: Remove 1 strength from all opposing non-Gold units. Add 1 strength to all non-Gold units on your side of the battlefield (except self).
flavorText: I care not for kings and their titles. In the east lives one who truly deserves a crown.
name: Saskia

description: Choose a Bronze unit (other than a Reaver Scout) on your side of the battlefield. Play an instance of it from your deck.
flavorText: Haven't had much luck with monsters of late, so we enlisted.
name: Reaver Scout

description: Choose any card in your deck, then shuffle your deck and place the chosen card on top.
flavorText: My mark scars the face of our future empress. That is my proudest achievement.
name: Stefan Skellen

description: Play a random non-Gold Special Card from your deck.
flavorText: I spit on Scoia'tael ideals, but not on their coin.
name: Elven Mercenary

description: Add 1 strength to all other non-Gold units on the row. Whenever there are 3 or more units on the opposite row at the end of a turn, transform into Old Speartip: Awake.
flavorText: Do not disturb.
name: Old Speartip: Asleep

description: While in your hand, deck or on the battlefield, gain 2 strength whenever a Commando Neophyte appears on your side.
flavorText: Love justifies madness in any of its forms.
name: Ele'yas

description: Spawn an Arachas whenever a Monsters unit on your side absorbs strength.
flavorText: Like a cross between a crab, a spider… and a mountain.
name: Arachas Behemoth

description: When removed from the battlefield, spawn 2 Lesser Golems on the row where this unit was.
flavorText: Does not drink. Does not eat. Does walk, however. And fight.
name: Golem

description: Remove 6 strength from an opposing unit.
flavorText: King or beggar, what's the difference? One dh'oine less.
name: Iorveth

description: Move a card in your hand to the bottom of your deck. Create in your hand a base copy of another card of the same color randomly chosen from both players' cards (all locations). Banish when moved to the graveyard.
flavorText: Life without savoring the sound of ""surreptitious shananacking"" is like licking snails through a cloth.
name: Johnny

description: After 2 turns, move the strongest other non-Gold unit on the row to the other side (ties are resolved randomly).
flavorText: Why fight? There are much better ways to work off excess energy…
name: Succubus

description: Spawn a Lord of Undvik on the opposing side.
flavorText: Instead of mournin' the fallen, let's drink to their memory!
name: Hjalmar

description: Remove 8 strength from any unit.
flavorText: A king should be merciless towards his enemies and generous to his friends.
name: Radovid

description: At the start of your turn, remove 1 strength from the strongest opposing non-Gold unit(s).
flavorText: A good sorceress must know when to conjure ice… and when to conjure fire.
name: Yennefer: The Conjurer

description: Immune to Weather. Remove 3 strength from an opposing unit and 1 strength from all other units on its row.
flavorText: Ladd nahw! Kill them! Litter the earth with their entrails!
name: Imlerith

description: Remove 3 strength from an opposing non-Gold unit.
flavorText: Imagine a cross between a winged snake and a nightmare. Wyverns are worse.
name: Wyvern

description: Draw 2 non-Gold cards. Play 1 and randomly place the other in your deck.
flavorText: Picture Dandelion in a dress and you've got the general idea.
name: Priscilla

description: Gain 1 strength whenever an opposing unit is weakened.
flavorText: Swords are for wenches. Get yourself an axe.
name: Clan Tuirseach Axeman

description: Look at the top 3 cards in your opponent's deck. You may move 1 to the bottom of that deck.
flavorText: Astrology, hydromancy, haruspicy, ceromancy. Ovomancy, spodomancy, metroscopy, brontoscopy…
name: Xarthisius

description: Spawn a Rain effect on both Siege rows that sets the strength of all non-immune units on or appearing there to 1. Units regain all strength removed by Rain when Rain is removed or they move out of it.
flavorText: Even the rain in this land smells vile.
name: Torrential Rain

description: Immune to Weather. Remove 1 strength from an opposing non-Gold unit and gain 2 strength if that unit is destroyed.
flavorText: The White Frost is coming.
name: Wild Hunt Warrior

description: Resurrect a Bronze non-Permadeath unit.
flavorText: Modron Freya, the Great Mother, is the goddess of love, beauty and bounty.
name: Priestess of Freya

description: Redraw up to 1 card.
flavorText: Piss off! We aren't all philanderers. Some of us have depth…
name: Thaler

description: Move all instances of an opposing non-Gold unit from your opponent's deck to their graveyard.
flavorText: And hands off the girl! Whatever we may be, we're not savages.
name: Sweers

description: Every 2 turns, if possible, banish a random non-Gold Special Card in your graveyard and absorb 3 strength.
flavorText: ”What have I done?” the mage cried out, frightened of his own creation.
name: Frightener

description: Immune to Weather. Gain 5 strength each time a Frost effect is spawned on this unit's row.
flavorText: Fled one time in my life. From the Ice Giant. And I'm not a bit ashamed.
name: Ice Giant

description: Draw 2 cards, then discard 2 cards.
flavorText: Only the ignorant dismiss the importance of myths.
name: Ermion

description: Add 3 strength to all other non-Gold units on the row.
flavorText: Sure, I'll patch you up. Gonna cost you though.
name: Hawker Healer

description: Destroy the weakest non-Gold unit(s) on the battlefield.
flavorText: Epidemics respect no persons, no borders.
name: Epidemic

description: Give this unit a shield. The shield protects its bearer from one strength-removing effect.
flavorText: Death and glory!
name: Alba Spearmen

description: Destroy a non-Gold unit on your side and absorb its strength.
flavorText: Who would think that overgrown bats would have a taste for gaudy jewelry?
name: Ekimmara

description: Play all Crone units from your deck.
flavorText: I'd be your best – and last.
name: Crone: Whispess

description: Play Eskel and Lambert from your deck.
flavorText: If you're to be hanged, ask for water. Anything can happen before they fetch it.
name: Vesemir

description: Play all Temerian Foot Soldiers from your deck.
flavorText: Temeria! Temeria! Gods shed all grace on thee! And smite thy foes with horrid woes, for all eternity!
name: Temerian Foot Soldier

description: Transform into a Raging Bear if weakened but not destroyed.
flavorText: In their ballads skalds claim you cannot tell a berserker changed in the heat of battle from a true–born bear.
name: Raging Berserker

description: No ability.
flavorText: We know little about what manticores look like: though many have seen them, very few have lived to tell their tale.
name: Manticore

description: Move all Spying non-Gold units to your side of the battlefield.
flavorText: A sword is but one of many tools at a ruler's disposal.
name: John Calveit

description: Create on the bottom of your deck 2 base copies of a Bronze unit on your side of the battlefield.
flavorText: Take heed, gents, there's nekkers under this here bridge.
name: Nekker Warrior

description: Return a Bronze, non-Relentless unit on your side (other than a Blue Mountain Commando) to your hand and immediately play it again.
flavorText: By the time we'd heard them, it was already too late…
name: Blue Mountain Commando

description: Play all Crone units from your deck.
flavorText: We'll cut you up, boy. A fine broth you will make.
name: Crone: Brewess

description: Resurrect a non-Gold, non-Permadeath unit.
flavorText: Few know more about healing than Nenneke.
name: Nenneke

description: Ambush: When a revealed non-Gold unit appears on the row, remove 4 strength from all non-Gold units on the row (except self).
flavorText: They track like hounds, run like deer and kill like heartless demons.
name: Dol Blathanna Trapper

description: Spawn 2 Harpy Eggs on random rows on your side.
flavorText: There are many species of harpy, and all are kleptomaniacs.
name: Harpy

description: Choose a non-Gold unit in your hand and give all instances of it in your hand and deck a shield. The shield protects its bearer from one strength-removing effect.
flavorText: The witcher raised a hand and quickly traced a path with it in the air. The crowd's rumble rose, the stones flew thicker. Yet the Sign curved their course, pushing them aside. They simply passed their target, protected by a shield unseen.
name: Quen Sign

description: Spawn 1 Commando Neophyte on a random row whenever you play a Special Card.
flavorText: It dawns on them once they notice my scar: a realization of imminent death.
name: Isengrim

description: Remove 1 strength from a random opposing non-Gold unit whenever a Gold card appears on your side.
flavorText: Never manages to hit the same place twice, which, upon further reflection, might constitute a real problem.
name: Reinforced Ballista

description: When moved to the graveyard, transform into a Bear.
flavorText: Now finish your soup, or a berserker'll come and swallow ye whole.
name: Berserker Marauder

description: Immune to Weather. Move an opposing non-Gold unit to that side's Siege row.
flavorText: Though the witchman lusts for gold, for the smiting of a drowner thou shalt give him but a silver penny, or three halfpence, at most.
name: Drowner

description: Spawn an Impenetrable Fog or Torrential Rain card, then banish self.
flavorText: This ain't no normal storm. This here's the wrath of the gods.
name: Skellige Storm

description: Ambush: When the opposing player passes, add 2 strength to all other non-Gold units on the row.
flavorText: I'd gladly kill you from up close, stare in your eyes… But you reek, human.
name: Toruviel

description: After 3 turns, spawn Hemdall on this unit's side. Destroy Kambi whenever Hemdall appears on the same side.
flavorText: When the time comes, the cockerel Kambi shall crow and awaken Hemdall.
name: Kambi

description: Immune to Weather. Gain 3 strength each time a Weather effect appears.
flavorText: Little Sarah wants to play!
name: Sarah

description: Spawn the appropriate Weather effect on the opposite row only.
flavorText: Her true name's Astrid Lyttneyd Ásgeirrfinnbjornsdottir, but that never fit on any forms.
name: Coral

description: Destroy the strongest non-Gold unit(s) on the battlefield.
flavorText: Geralt took one step back. He'd seen men hit by Scorch before. Or more accurately, seen what remained of them afterwards.
name: Scorch

description: When removed from the battlefield, spawn a Chort on the row where this unit was.
flavorText: Mooooo.
name: Prize-Winning Cow

description: Resurrect a non-Gold, non-Permadeath unit and convert it to Gold until removed from the battlefield or the round ends.
flavorText: I'm a medic. I tend to know what I'm doing when I prescribe something.
name: Shani

description: Spawn a Lesser Fire Elemental on this unit's row at the start of your turn.
flavorText: Can't stand the heat? Then you don't stand a chance.
name: Fire Elemental

description: No ability.
flavorText: Vrihedd? What's that mean?"" ""Trouble.
name: Vrihedd Brigade

description: Remove 4 strength from all instances of a non-Gold unit on its side.
flavorText: Kills quicker than you can recite the Emperor of Nilfgaard's title in full.
name: Manticore Venom

description: Resurrect all Queensguards and add 1 base strength to your Cerys unit, wherever it is.
flavorText: The queen is guarded by the hardiest and fiercest shieldmaidens Skellige's ever known.
name: Queensguard

description: Gain 2 strength whenever a Gold card appears on your side.
flavorText: The latest rage in assaults on walled cities.
name: Reinforced Siege Tower

description: Spawn either a Unicorn or a Chironex card.
flavorText: Magic is Chaos, Art and Science. It is a curse, a blessing and a progression.
name: Yennefer

description: Spawn either Clear Skies or Rally.
flavorText: The sun's shinin', Dromle! The sun's shinin'! Maybe there's hope after all…
name: First Light

description: Set the strength of all other non-Gold units on the row to 1.
flavorText: Soon the power of kings will wither, and the Lodge shall seize its rightful place.
name: Philippa Eilhart

description: Reset all units on a row to base strength. Convert Gold units on that row to Silver (or Bronze, if that was their original color).
flavorText: An important part of every Witch Hunter's kit. In one muted flash, it turns the most powerful sorcerer into pork jelly ripe for cutting.
name: Dimeritium Bomb

description: Add 2 strength to each non-Gold unit played on your side. Does not affect spawned units.
flavorText: Dandelion, you're a cynic, a lecher, a liar – and my best friend.
name: Dandelion

description: Resurrect a random Bronze non-Permadeath unit.
flavorText: Stitch red to red, white to white, and everything will be all right.
name: Field Medic

description: Banish a non-Gold card in the opposing graveyard.
flavorText: I once made a prisoner vomit his own entrails… Ah, good times…
name: Dethmold

description: Remove 3 strength from all non-Gold units on a row.
flavorText: A sight more horrid you've never seen… The poor soul lay shredded as the beast lapped up its blood from the ground all around.
name: Lacerate

description: Convert all units on one of your rows to Gold until removed from the battlefield or the round ends.
flavorText: King Henselt did not look like a thief, but, with all due respect, that's really what he was.
name: Henselt

description: Gain 2 base strength at the start of your turn if it's the sole revealed unit on the row.
flavorText: He'll not reveal his name till he's defeated. He's a troll errant, see?
name: Champion of Champions

description: Set strength to that of an opposing non-Gold unit.
flavorText: A mimic, among the many other names for his sort: changelings, doublings, vexlings… or dopplers.
name: Dudu

description: Resurrect when discarded.
flavorText: We are An Craite! What others buy with gold, we buy with our lifeblood.
name: Clan an Craite Raider

description: Add 3 base strength to 2 non-Gold units in your graveyard.
flavorText: Hear ye now the tale of the heroic deeds of Clan an Craite.
name: Draig Bon–Dhu

description: Spawn a Cow Carcass on an opposing row.
flavorText: Let historians debate whether spreading plague in a besieged city is ethical. We just care if it's effective.
name: Rot Tosser

description: Remove 3 strength from an opposing non-Gold unit.
flavorText: Take another step, dh'oine. You'd look better with an arrow between your eyes.
name: Dol Blathanna Archer

description: Spawn a Commando Neophyte on a random row.
flavorText: Temerians, Redanians, all the same. Better off dead.
name: Vrihedd Vanguard

description: Transform all non-Gold Harpy Eggs on your side into Harpies and add 2 to their strength. Gain 1 strength for each Harpy Egg this unit transformed.
flavorText: Common harpies feed on carrion. Celaeno harpies… they feed on dreams.
name: Celaeno Harpy

description: Play all Arachasae from your deck.
flavorText: Ugly – nature's way of saying ""stay away.
name: Arachas

description: Resurrect a non-Gold Special Card from your graveyard.
flavorText: Brokilon bleeds… and not even I can heal it.
name: Aglaïs

description: Gain {bst1} strength for each Spying unit on the opposing side.
flavorText: The Impera Brigade never surrenders. Ever.
name: Impera Brigade

description: Remove 2 strength from a random opposing non-Gold unit whenever a card in either hand is revealed.
flavorText: This model specializes in slinging corpses and ripe dung.
name: Mangonel

description: After 2 turns, play a Reaver Hunter from your deck.
flavorText: See this here tattoo? 'At's me, hackin' at a dragon. A DRAGON, m'lady.
name: Reaver Hunter

description: Add 1 strength to all your other Dwarf units, wherever they are.
flavorText: Our mead smells rotten to ye, do it? Easy to fix – I'll break yer nose!
name: Barclay Els

description: No ability.
flavorText: If that's what it takes to save the world, it's better to let that world die.
name: Geralt

description: Reset a non-Gold unit to base strength.
flavorText: These are not the hands of an ""Excellency,"" but of a farmer. So we speak peasant to peasant.
name: Peter Saar Gwynleve

description: No ability.
flavorText: For glory! For Radovid!
name: Redanian Knight

description: Immune to Weather. Reset all weakened non-Gold units on the row to base strength.
flavorText: Ye're in for a poundin'.
name: Clan Tordarroch Armorsmith

description: Play a Silver card from your deck.
flavorText: That doddery dolt? Ye cannae even tell if he's alive or stuffed!
name: Brouver Hoog

description: Destroy all opposing non-Gold units with 3 strength or lower.
flavorText: Some men cannot admit defeat. Some keep fighting from beyond the grave.
name: Draug

description: Immune to Weather.
flavorText: Stay calm, everyone. And be alert. The true owners of those cloaks and beaver–skin caps might be elsewhere.
name: Dun Banner Light Cavalry

description: Immune to Weather. Draw 1 card and discard 1 random non-Gold card from your deck.
flavorText: I've gathered all the jarls together. Now make your case.
name: Donar an Hindar

description: Immune to Weather. When on a row affected by Weather at the start of your turn, create a Clan Dimun Pirate on the bottom of your deck.
flavorText: Merely mention this name to a Nilfgaardian, and they'll feel a spreading warmth in their knickers…
name: Wild Boar of the Sea

description: While in your hand, deck or on the battlefield, gain {bst1} strength whenever a card in either player's hand is revealed.
flavorText: The North has nothing with which it could surprise us.
name: Spotter

description: After 4 turns, remove 1 strength from all opposing non-Gold units. Then return this Ocvist to your hand, set its base strength to 6 and remove its ability.
flavorText: The Master of Quartz Mountain, the Destroyer, Trajan's Slayer. In his free time, he likes long walks and candlelight dinners.
name: Ocvist

description: Add 2 strength to all other non-Gold units on the row.
flavorText: The deeds of Clan Heymaey will go down in history.
name: Clan Heymaey Skald

description: Play immediately from your deck whenever there are 5 or more revealed Elf units on your side.
flavorText: Better to die standing than to live on bent knee.
name: Aelirenn

description: Gain 6 strength whenever either player uses a Leader card.
flavorText: Your Imperial Highness…"" blurted out the seneschal, whose presence until now had been thoroughly ignored. ""I beg your pardon, but Cahir… My son...
name: Ceallach

description: If 3 or more Redanian Elites are on your side of the battlefield, convert them to Gold until removed from the battlefield or the round ends.
flavorText: I'll die for Redania, I'll kill for Redania… I'll even eat worms for Redania!
name: Redanian Elite

description: Remove 4 strength from any unit.
flavorText: I can take care of myself. Trust me.
name: Triss Merigold

description: If possible, draw a card, then create {card1} in your opponent's hand and reveal it.
flavorText: Cynthia's talents can be deadly. She needs a tight leash.
name: Cynthia

description: Choose a non-Gold unit in your hand (other than an Operator). Create an exact copy in both players' hands. Banish when moved to the graveyard.
flavorText: As time and space collapse before us, they expand behind us. In that way one moves forward through both.
name: Operator

description: Gain 2 strength for each Dwarf unit on your side of the battlefield.
flavorText: The key's mixin' pleasure an' business – like smackin' foes and gettin' coin for it.
name: Dwarven Mercenary

description: When removed from the battlefield, spawn 3 Lesser Earth Elementals on the row where this unit was.
flavorText: How do you fight an earth elemental? You don't. You run. Fast as you can.
name: Earth Elemental

description: Remove 3 strength from an opposing non-Gold unit. If it is not destroyed, gain 2 strength.
flavorText: Worked a pickaxe all me life. Battleaxe won't be any trouble.
name: Dwarven Skirmisher

description: Immune to Weather. Discard all Clan Dimun Pirates from your deck.
flavorText: Can see the fear in their eyes. Fear o' me… fear o' Clan Dimun!
name: Clan Dimun Pirate

description: Ambush: When the round ends, return to the hand of the current owner if that player lost.
flavorText: The path to freedom is paved in blood, not ink.
name: Ciaran

description: After 1 turn, lock all non-Gold units on the row and the opposite row. A locked unit loses all tokens (Resilience, Quen, etc.) and its ability does not trigger while it remains on the battlefield.
flavorText: Famed for constantly prophesying the world's doom. Not much fun at parties.
name: Ithlinne

description: Remove 4 strength from an opposing non-Gold unit.
flavorText: The Lodge lacks humility. Our lust for power may yet be our undoing.
name: Síle de Tansarville

description: Spawn a Biting Frost or Impenetrable Fog card, then banish self.
flavorText: Behold Tedd Deireadh, the Final Age. The world destroyed by the White Frost.
name: White Frost

description: Spawn a base copy of the last non-Gold Special Card played, then banish self.
flavorText: You exact from the earth a blood ransom, ripping out its riches by force. To us it bloomed, bore fruit and gave freely, for it loved us as we loved it.
name: Nature's Gift

description: Play all instances from your deck of a Bronze unit on your side of the battlefield.
flavorText: Sound the retreat! Regroup! And wait for reinforcements!
name: Reinforcement

description: Play the top loyal-only non-Gold unit in your deck and add 8 to its strength.
flavorText: To describe the manner in which Duke de Wett led the Verden Group as ""incompetent"" would be far too kind.
name: Joachim de Wett

description: Remove an amount equal to this unit's strength from an opposing non-Gold unit.
flavorText: Mona…? No… no. I'm Braenn. A daughter of Brokilon.
name: Braenn

description: Move a non-Gold card from your opponent's graveyard to your own.
flavorText: Griffins like to toy with their prey. Eat 'em alive, piece by piece.
name: Griffin

description: Reset any unit on the battlefield to base strength. If Gold, convert it to Silver (or Bronze, if that was its original color).
flavorText: The mage's arms were twisted and bound behind his back. The Redanians gave the fetters a good shake. Terranova cried out, lurched, bent backwards, bowed forward, then retched and groaned. It was clear of what his manacles were made.
name: Dimeritium Shackles

description: Lose 2 strength.
flavorText: Our clan's bards will sing of my deeds long after you're dead and forgotten!
name: Clan an Craite Warrior

description: Spawn 2 base copies of this unit on the same row.
flavorText: I's a war veteran! Spare me a crown?
name: Poor Infantry

description: Play the weakest non-Gold unit from your deck. Ties are resolved randomly.
flavorText: I might just discover I look great without ears… or hands. Apparently the King of Beggars accepts both as partial payment.
name: King of Beggars

description: Double the strength of all weakened non-Gold units on your side of the battlefield.
flavorText: Some fight for Temeria. Other fight for Nilfgaard. I fight for the Heron.
name: Warcry

description: Play Vesemir and Lambert from your deck.
flavorText: I'm a simple witcher, Wolf. Don't fight dragons, don't fraternize with kings and don't sleep with sorceresses…
name: Eskel

description: Draw 2 cards. Discard 2 cards.
flavorText: A djinn, good sirs, fulfills but three wishes. Thus freed, it flees to dimensions unknown.
name: The Last Wish

description: Add {bst1} strength to all other non-Gold units on the row.
flavorText: The Emperor will teach the North discipline.
name: Nauzicaa Standard Bearer

description: No ability.
flavorText: I was there, on the front lines! Right where the fightin' was the thickest!
name: Sheldon Skaggs

description: Remove 3 strength from an opposing non-Gold unit.
flavorText: Not the best for taking cities, but great for razing them to the ground.
name: Fire Scorpion

description: Remove 1 strength from a random opposing non-Gold unit whenever a non-Ambush Elf unit appears on your side.
flavorText: I hate you, dh'oine. You are all the same.
name: Malena

description: Add 3 strength to 3 non-Gold units on your side of the battlefield.
flavorText: That square should bear the names of my soldiers, of the dead. Not mine.
name: John Natalis

description: Immune to Weather.
flavorText: Pledge your allegiance to our Emperor, Emhyr var Emreis… or die.
name: Alba Pikeman

description: Return a non-Gold, non-Relentless unit on your side to your hand, add  3 to its base strength and immediately play it again, then banish self.
flavorText: When you run out of peasants, decoys also make decent arrow fodder.
name: Decoy

description: Remove Weather from its row.
flavorText: It's a griffin, just more… griffiny.
name: Archgriffin

description: Move to a random row on the same side at the start of your turn and add 1 strength to all other non-Gold units on the row.
flavorText: Drinkin' without Odrin is like rowin' without a paddle.
name: Odrin

description: When moved to the graveyard, randomly place in your deck and gain 3 base strength.
flavorText: Know when fairy tales cease to be tales? When people start believing them.
name: Ciri: Dash

description: Immune to Weather. Remove 1 strength from all other non-Gold units on the row. Draw a card.
flavorText: We are the drops of rain that together make a ferocious storm.
name: Yaevinn

description: Remove 7 strength from a non-Gold unit.
flavorText: We stand not the slightest chance of incanting a spell so complex as Alzur's Thunder. It is claimed Alzur had a voice like a hunting horn and the diction of a master orator.
name: Alzur's Thunder

description: Immune to Weather. Look at the top card in your deck. You may place it at the bottom of your deck. Draw a card. While Spying, gain 6 strength.
flavorText: Men require constant alluring. Mystique and refinement do the job quite well.
name: Cantarella

description: Remove 2 strength from a non-Gold unit, then 2 from a non-Gold unit, then 1 from a non-Gold unit.
flavorText: Never get between a mother dragon and her young.
name: Myrgtabrakke

description: Immune to Weather. Remove 2 strength from a random opposing non-Gold unit whenever a Wild Hunt unit appears on your side.
flavorText: Each Wild Hunt warrior has gone through a rigorous selection process, but Eredin's personal cavalcade includes only the most brutal and most ferocious of the Aen Elle.
name: Nithral

description: Add {bst1} strength to a random non-Gold unit on your side of the battlefield.
flavorText: A spy? No, that's saying far too much. I consider myself more of an observer.
name: Ambassador

description: Immune to Weather. Spawn a Rain effect.
flavorText: Seen a lot o' ugly critters in me life – morays, lampreys, blobfish… But never nothin' like this!
name: Water Hag

description: When moved to the graveyard, lose 2 base strength and resurrect.
flavorText: The vilest man Skellige's ever known.
name: Morkvarg

description: Spawn a Botchling or a Lubberkin.
flavorText: I've not been a good father, I know, but… perhaps it's not too late.
name: Bloody Baron

description: While in your hand, deck or on the battlefield, gain 1 strength whenever a Monsters unit on your side absorbs strength. When removed from the battlefield, play a Nekker from your deck.
flavorText: These little guys are almost cute, if you ignore the whole vicious killer aspect.
name: Nekker

description: Toggle the Resilience of a non-Gold unit on your side of the battlefield. A Resilient unit stays on the battlefield for the next round.
flavorText: Want irrefutable proof of civilization's advance? Look at war. Man gets better at killing with each one.
name: Combat Engineer

description: After 2 turns, both Leaders will again be available for use.
flavorText: His eyes flashed under his winged helmet. Fire gleamed from his sword's blade.
name: Cahir

description: After 2 turns, gain 1 base strength for each unit in your graveyard. When removed, set base strength to 4.
flavorText: WAAAAAAAAAAGH!!!!
name: Madman Lugos

description: Choose a non-Spying Bronze unit on your side of the battlefield. Spawn an exact copy on the same row.
flavorText: Don't need advisors and their schemes. I place my trust in my soldiers' blades.
name: Foltest

description: Gain 2 strength whenever you discard a unit.
flavorText: Haul together, hoist the colors high!
name: Clan Dimun Pirate Captain

description: Return a non-Relentless unit on your side to your hand and immediately play it again.
flavorText: The dryad queen has eyes of molten silver, and a heart of cold–forged steel.
name: Eithné

description: Immune to Weather. Remove 1 strength from 3 non-Gold units.
flavorText: So ye can hit a movin' target at two hundred paces? Me, too. In a storm.
name: Clan Brokvar Archer

description: Gain {bst1} strength whenever either player uses a Leader card.
flavorText: Members of the emperor's fanatic body guard fight to the bitter end.
name: Impera Enforcers

description: After 2 turns, convert to Gold until removed from the battlefield or the round ends.
flavorText: Always wondered – how the blazes do those lads handle nature's call…?
name: Dun Banner Heavy Cavalry

description: Gain Resilience. A Resilient unit stays on the battlefield for the next round.
flavorText: Ever hear o' the dragon Ocvist? From Quartz Mountain? Well, Yarpen Zigrin and his band o' dwarves did 'im in.
name: Yarpen Zigrin

description: When destroyed, remove 3 strength from all non-Gold units on its side.
flavorText: The Daughter of the Kaedweni Wilderness.
name: Sabrina Glevissig

description: If possible, discard a non-Gold unit, absorb its strength and draw a card.
flavorText: Big, bad, ugly. Squats in the sewers.
name: Giant Toad

description: No ability.
flavorText: Magic is the highest good. It transcends all borders and divisions.
name: Fringilla Vigo

description: Give a shield to all non-Gold units on the row. Repeat every 2 turns. The shield protects its bearer from one strength-removing effect.
flavorText: If I'm to die today, I wish to look smashing for the occasion.
name: Keira Metz

description: Every 3 turns, remove 2 strength from a random opposing non-Gold unit.
flavorText: Feel that? The earth trembles each time Big Bertha looses a stone.
name: Reinforced Trebuchet

description: Immune to Weather. Add 3 strength to a non-Gold unit on your side of the battlefield. If it's a Dwarf, add {add2} strength instead.
flavorText: Only one punishment for disturbin' the peace in Mahakam: a hammer to the heid.
name: Mahakam Guard

description: Redraw up to 3 cards.
flavorText: To live in peace, we first must kill. This is human oppression's cruel finale.
name: Francesca

description: Add 2 strength to the weakest non-Gold unit(s) on your side of the battlefield (except self), remove 1 strength from the weakest opposing non-Gold unit(s).
flavorText: Hatred burns brighter than any fire, and cuts deeper than any blade.
name: Vrihedd Officer

description: Play all Crone units from your deck.
flavorText: I sense your pain. I see your fear.
name: Crone: Weavess

description: Play Eredin.
flavorText: Have some dignity. You know how this will end.
name: Eredin

description: Gain Resilience when played and at the start of each round. A Resilient unit stays on the battlefield for the next round.
flavorText: I'm telling ye, we're born fer battle – we slash straight at their knees!
name: Mahakam Defender

description: Lock a non-Gold unit on the battlefield. A locked unit loses all tokens (Resilience, Quen, etc.) and its ability does not trigger while it remains on the battlefield.
flavorText: Everyone wantin' to trade in Novigrad's got a clear choice - agree terms with Cleaver or kiss their knees farewell.
name: Cleaver

description: Convert a Gold unit to Silver (or Bronze, if that was its original color).
flavorText: Forward, you sorry sods! Forward or you'll see the Nilfgaardians are the least of your worries!
name: Kaedweni Sergeant

description: Spawn 3 Shadows.
flavorText: He always grants exactly what you wish for. That's the problem.
name: Gaunter O'Dimm

description: Return the strongest non-Gold, non-Relentless unit (except self) on your side to your hand. Your opponent does the same if they have not yet passed. Ties are resolved randomly.
flavorText: With each arrow I loose, I think of my da. He'd be proud. I think.
name: Milva

description: Spawn Frost, Fog and Rain effects.
flavorText: In the Final Age, Hemdall will come forth to face the evil issuing from the land of Morhogg – the legions of wraiths, demons and specters of Chaos.
name: Ragh Nar Roog

description: Remove 1 strength from each non-Gold unit played on the battlefield. Does not affect spawned units.
flavorText: Tame""? Och, lad, Skelligers might train bears, but that don't at all mean they tame 'em…
name: Savage Bear

description: Spawn a Spectral Whale on a random row on the opposing side.
flavorText: I'm near ready to puke from boredom.
name: Blueboy Lugos

description: Resurrect at the start of the round and lose 2 base strength.
flavorText: At least you now know I don't easily lose my head.
name: Olgierd

description: When moved to the graveyard, convert to Silver.
flavorText: They call me Sparrowhawk. Know why? Because I eat rats like you for breakfast.
name: Cerys

description: Toggle the Resilience of a non-Gold unit on the battlefield. A Resilient unit stays on the battlefield for the next round.
flavorText: The beast rushed at them wildly, with fury in its eyes, immune to pain and any strikes the defenders could land. Nothing stood to stop it…
name: Adrenaline Rush

description: Remove 3 strength from a non-Gold unit.
flavorText: Better believe we can hunt. Thing is, not much game on Spikeroog…
name: Clan Brokvar Hunter

description: While in your hand, deck or on the battlefield, gain {boost1} strength whenever a card in either player's hand is revealed.
flavorText: For a fire mage, he's not very… flamboyant.
name: Vanhemar

description: Add 4 strength to a non-Gold unit on your side of the battlefield.
flavorText: Blue Stripes and Scoia'tael are similar in one regard – hatred fuels both.
name: Blue Stripes Scout

description: Draw 1 card, then discard 1 card.
flavorText: The emperor also thought him an accidental king. At first.
name: Svanrige

description: Spawn one of the two Field Marshal Duda units.
flavorText: Apologies. My exotic pet's a clever birdie, but a wee bit lewd. Paid ten thalers for the beaute.
name: Zoltan: Animal Tamer

description: Immune to Weather. Play all Wild Hunt Riders from your deck.
flavorText: First the buffalo horns atop their helms penetrate one's view, then the crest betwixt them, and finally the skull–like face exposed beneath their visors.
name: Wild Hunt Rider

description: Add 3 strength to 2 non-Gold units on your side of the battlefield.
flavorText: You gotta recalibrate the arm by five degrees. Do what by the what now?
name: Kaedweni Siege Support

description: Reveal a random card in your opponent's hand.
flavorText: Two ounces of calcium equum, one ounce of rubedo…
name: Alchemist

description: Add 2 base strength to a non-Gold unit on your side of the battlefield.
flavorText: Remember me words – a good shield can save yer life.
name: Clan Tordarroch Shieldsmith

description: Discard a non-Gold unit from your deck, then shuffle your deck.
flavorText: When a warrant says ""dead or alive,"" most bounty hunters'll just kill you. Not me. Should I catch you, you'll hang, and I'll tickle your feet as you expire.
name: Djenge Frett

description: Add 4 to all non-Gold units in your hand. When removed, remove 4 from all non-Gold units in your hand with strength greater than base.
flavorText: Cap'n… our arrows, they've… they've got wings!
name: Triss: Butterfly Spell

description: Toggle the Weather Immunity of all instances of a non-Gold unit on its side.
flavorText: The witcher moved with unnatural speed. Too fast for the human eye to register.
name: Blizzard Potion

description: Set the strength of all non-Gold units on one of your rows to 6.
flavorText: Paintings should convey emotion, not words.
name: Ge'els

description: Gain {bst1} strength at the start of each turn while Spying. If Spying when its owner passes, move to the opposing side.
flavorText: Here she comes,"" he thought, ""our imperial interest. A mock-princess, a mock-queen for Cintra. A mock-ruler for the mouth of the Yarra, future lifeblood of the empire.
name: Fake Ciri

description: Convert all instances of a non-Gold unit on your side of the battlefield to Gold until removed from the battlefield or the round ends.
flavorText: Not wealth or fame but intentions true –– that's what makes a hero of you!
name: Promote

description: Remove 2 strength from all non-Gold units on the row whenever a Special Card is played.
flavorText: No matter what you may have heard, elves don't take human scalps. Too much lice.
name: Vrihedd Sappers

description: Ambush: When the next non-Gold Special Card is played, cancel its effects, then destroy the strongest opposing non-Gold unit(s).
flavorText: Time to look death in the face.
name: Schirrú

description: Draw and immediately play a random non-Gold card from the opposing graveyard.
flavorText: The gods have spoken: a sacrifice is required.
name: Udalryk

description: Remove 5 strength from an opposing non-Gold unit with strength of 10 or more.
flavorText: You might manage to hide from them, but once spotted, don't bother trying to run.
name: Dol Blathanna Marksman

description: If possible, destroy an unrevealed Ambush card and gain 4 strength.
flavorText: Lady Eithné's daughter had inherited her sublime beauty and her wild hatred for all that is human.
name: Morenn

description: Remove 2 strength from a random opposing non-Gold unit whenever a unit on your side is destroyed or you discard a unit.
flavorText: They say Hemdall's heart swells whenever the longships sail out on a raid.
name: War Longship

description: No ability.
flavorText: Some call her the ""Iron Maiden.
name: Jutta an Dimun

description: Draw 3 cards. Keep 1 and discard the rest.
flavorText: Skellige must have a strong king. No matter what it takes.
name: Birna Bran

description: Play on a random row from your deck or graveyard whenever a Gold card appears on your side.
flavorText: Geralt, we gotta have a man–to–horse talk. No offense, but your riding skills? They leave a bit to be desired, buddy.
name: Roach

description: Remove 1 strength from all non-Gold units on the opposite row. Gain ?? strength for each.
flavorText: Join me King Ravodid army. Order got – guard boatses.
name: Trololo

description: Spawn either a Mutagen or a Spores effect.
flavorText: Eat enough of them, and the world will never be the same…
name: Mardroeme

description: Gain Resilience when played and at the start of each round. A Resilient unit stays on the battlefield for the next round.
flavorText: Drinkin' alone's like crappin' with company.
name: Zoltan Chivay

description: Whenever this unit is weakened but not destroyed, play an instance of it from your deck.
flavorText: They'll shatter on our shields like waves on a craggy shore.
name: Clan Drummond Shieldmaiden

description: Gain 3 strength whenever you play a Special Card.
flavorText: Elf, dwarf, makes no difference – long as they've got coin.
name: Hawker Support

description: Move 3 non-Gold units on the opposite row one row back. Remove 1 strength from all moved units.
flavorText: A blast of concentrated energy that pummels everything in its path. Great for when you forget your keys.
name: Geralt: Aard

description: After 1 turn, banish all non-Gold units in your graveyard and absorb 1 strength for each.
flavorText: Their long tongues're for slurping marrow – and whipping prey.
name: Grave Hag

description: Remove 3 strength from all weakened opposing units and 2 strength from all other opposing units.
flavorText: No one knows how he got his nickname – no one's dared to ask.
name: Harald the Cripple

description: Resurrect a non-Gold, non-Permadeath unit. Gain 1 strength whenever a unit is played on your side from either graveyard.
flavorText: Fall on your knees and beg Modron Freya for forgiveness.
name: Sigrdrifa

description: Remove 2 strength from 2 opposing non-Gold units.
flavorText: Castle won't batter itself down, now will it? Get them trebuchets rollin'!
name: Trebuchet

description: Immune to Weather.
flavorText: Escape them? In the waters of Skellige? Good luck.
name: Light Longship

description: If possible, draw a card, then your opponent draws a card and reveals it.
flavorText: A ball of fire? Why, naturally. Whatsoever Your Imperial Majesty desires.
name: Albrich

description: Immune to Weather. Remove 2 strength from 3 non-Gold units.
flavorText: Now let's drink to Emperor of Nilfgaard – may he die of somethin' hideous!
name: Holger Blackhand

description: Reveal ?? random cards in the opposing hand.
flavorText: They do not call me the Patient. Take care they do not call you the Headless.
name: Emhyr var Emreis

description: Convert all other Gold units to Silver (or Bronze, if that was their original color). Gain 2 strength for each unit converted.
flavorText: Really believe you can dupe me with that tale you just pulled from your arse?
name: Dijkstra

description: Remove 5 strength from an opposing unit.
flavorText: A patriot… and a real pain in the rear.
name: Vernon Roche

description: No ability.
flavorText: A fiend looks a bit like a deer. An enormous, evil deer.
name: Fiend

description: Return to your hand if you lose the round.
flavorText: I go wherever I please, whenever I please.
name: Ciri

description: Draw 2 cards. The opposing player draws 1 card.
flavorText: You humans have… unusual tastes.
name: Avallac'h

description: If your opponent has not passed, gain 15 base strength, then your opponent draws a card and reveals it. When removed, set base strength to 7.
flavorText: Tibor's zeal was legendary. It was said when the emperor passed, he'd not so much bow as somersault.
name: Tibor Eggebracht

description: Remove 3 strength from an opposing non-Gold unit. If the unit's strength is higher than base, remove 5 strength instead.
flavorText: I aim for the knees. Always.
name: Black Infantry Arbalest

description: When resurrected, gain 3 base strength.
flavorText: Friends we show heart, foes we show our axe. Remember that.
name: Clan Tuirseach Skirmishers

description: Remove 3 strength from an opposing non-Gold unit.
flavorText: What crossbows want to be when they grow up.
name: Ballista

description: Banish 3 non-Gold units on the row and add their strength to this unit's base strength. When removed, set base strength to 1.
flavorText: Witchers never die in their beds.
name: Letho of Gulet

description: Spawn a Ban Ard Adept whenever a Gold card appears on your side.
flavorText: I care only about what's good for Aretuza and my pupils.
name: Margarita Laux–Antille

description: After 3 turns, destroy the strongest non-Gold unit(s) twice in a row.
flavorText: Also calls himself Borkh Three Jackdaws… he's not the best at names.
name: Villentretenmerth

description: Swap the strength of the strongest and weakest unit on the battlefield. Ties are resolved randomly.
flavorText: Gaze long into the abyss, and the abyss will gaze back into you.
name: Bekker's Twisted Mirror

description: Reveal a random card in your hand.
flavorText: Sons of noble houses, born in the City of the Golden Towers, form the elite backbone of the Imperial Army.
name: Nilfgaardian Knight

description: Add 2 strength to all other Blue Stripes Commandos in your hand, deck or on your side of the battlefield.
flavorText: I'd do anything for Temeria. Mostly though, I kill for her.
name: Blue Stripes Commando

description: Immune to Weather. Draw 1 card face up and 1 card face down. Keep 1 and randomly place the other in your deck.
flavorText: He wears armor made of gold. Of course he's a jerk.
name: Prince Stennis

description: Spawn a Fog effect on both Ranged rows that sets the strength of all non-immune units on or appearing there to 1. Units regain all strength removed by Fog when Fog is removed or they move out of it.
flavorText: A good commander's dream… and a bad one's horror.
name: Impenetrable Fog

description: Spawn a Biting Frost or Torrential Rain card, then banish self.
flavorText: The sky dimmed of a sudden, and clouds amassed over the town. It grew fiendishly dark, and a cold gust swept in. ""Oh my,"" gasped Yennefer. ""We're about to make quite the mess, I think.
name: Merigold's Hailstorm

description: Add 8 strength to a non-Gold unit. If it's a Witcher, add {add2} strength instead.
flavorText: Symbolizing spring and rejuvenation, the swallow lent its name to this potion that accelerates the rate at which wounds scab over and heal.
name: Swallow Potion

description: Immune to Weather. Spawn 3 Rabid Wolves and a Fog effect.
flavorText: We never hunt in these woods. Not even if it means the whole village'll starve.
name: Woodland Spirit

description: Play the top Bronze unit in your deck.
flavorText: But… but there's no justice in it! One does not kill the messenger!
name: Emissary

description: Move an opposing Spying non-Gold unit to your side and add 8 to its strength.
flavorText: Many believe the empire's power rests upon the shoulders of its disciplined army and dutiful mages. In truth, the Nilfgaardian floren rules the world.
name: Treason

description: Resurrect a Bronze non-Permadeath unit from the opposing graveyard.
flavorText: The world has known as many plagues as it has wars. Yet both war and plague always take men by surprise.
name: Vicovaro Medic

description: Destroy the weakest non-Gold unit(s) twice in a row.
flavorText: They said the queen was prone to outbursts, but I did not expect that…
name: Pavetta

description: Spawn a Frost effect on both Melee rows that sets the strength of all non-immune units on or appearing there to 1. Units regain all strength removed by Frost when Frost is removed or they move out of it.
flavorText: Best thing about frost? Bodies of the fallen don't rot so quickly.
name: Biting Frost

description: Immune to Weather. Gain 1 strength at the start of your turn if on a row affected by Fog.
flavorText: Many primal fears lurk in the hearts of men. The fear of the mist is well–founded…
name: Ancient Foglet

description: Add 4 strength to all instances of a non-Gold unit on its side. If it's a Witcher, add {add2} strength instead.
flavorText: The witcher's face changed… his mien turning inhuman, horrifying.
name: Thunderbolt Potion

description: Choose an opposing non-Gold unit and remove 1 from its strength for each revealed card in both players' hands.
flavorText: We do what we must. I am not ashamed of that.
name: Serrit

description: Look at the top 3 cards in your deck and play 1.
flavorText: The summer sun reflected in the quiet waters of the Alba – that's Nilfgaard to me.
name: Morvran Voorhis

description: Resurrect a non-Gold, non-Permadeath unit from the opposing graveyard.
flavorText: There are more things in heaven and earth than all the world's philosophers have dreamt.
name: Caretaker

description: Lose 1 strength whenever a non-Gold Machine is played on your side. Then add 3 to that unit's strength.
flavorText: I never miss twice.
name: Kaedweni Siege Expert

description: When removed from the battlefield, transform into Regis: Higher Vampire and play.
flavorText: Men, the polite ones, at least, would call me a monster. A blood–drinking freak.
name: Regis

description: Spawn 2 Clan an Craite Warriors.
flavorText: Nilfgaardians call 'im Tirth ys Muire, the Wild Boar o' the Sea. Use 'im to scare their kiddies!
name: Crach an Craite

description: Reveal up to 2 cards in your hand. For each card thus revealed, reveal 1 random card in your opponent's hand.
flavorText: There's never been a problem a well–planned assassination couldn't solve.
name: Vattier de Rideaux

description: Remove 2 strength from all opposing non-Gold units and 1 strength from all non-Gold units on your side of the battlefield.
flavorText: The sorcerer Stammelford moved a mountain that obscured the view from his tower. Rumor has it he could only do so for he'd fettered a d'ao, an earth elemental.
name: Stammelford's Tremors

description: Add 3 strength to the strongest non-Gold unit in your deck and play it. Ties are resolved randomly.
flavorText: A few of Alzur's monstrous creations roam the world still. Not least among them the horrid viy, who massacred its mage-creator and destroyed half of Maribor before fleeing into Riverdell's gloomy woodland.
name: Alzur's Double–Cross

description: Immune to Weather. Play from your deck or graveyard whenever Fog is spawned. Destroy when moved outside of Fog or Fog is removed.
flavorText: Fog creeps on little cat feet. Foglets creep over the bodies of their victims.
name: Foglet

description: When destroyed, add 3 strength to all opposing non-Gold units.
flavorText: I remember so little… Yet when I think of my rose, I begin to recall what was.
name: Iris

description: Spawn a Biting Frost, Impenetrable Fog, Torrential Rain or First Light card.
flavorText: That is not dead which can eternal lie, and with strange aeons even death may die.
name: Dagon

description: Destroy the strongest non-Gold unit(s) on the opposite row if that row totals 20 or more strength.
flavorText: A twist of a witcher's fingers can light a lamp… or incinerate a foe.
name: Geralt: Igni

description: Gain 4 strength whenever you play an Ambush.
flavorText: You mean to say the she–elf danced amidst the fray? Have you lost your mind, corporal?!
name: Elven Wardancer

description: Spawn a Biting Frost, Impenetrable Fog or Torrential Rain card, then banish self.
flavorText: The druid Vaedermakar controls the elements. He soothes storms into silence, musters destructive hail, summons lightning to turn foes into ash. So I advise you well… treat him with utmost respect.
name: Aeromancy

description: Ambush: When the next opposing non-Gold Special Card is played, cancel its effects.
flavorText: I am a Sage. My power lies in possessing knowledge. Not sharing it.
name: Ida Emean

description: Remove 1 strength from 3 non-Gold units on your side of the battlefield. Gain 3 strength for each.
flavorText: An archdruid, a master of alchemy, and the grumpiest old fart in the Isles.
name: Gremist

description: Destroy 3 non-Gold units on your side and absorb their strength as base. When removed, set base strength to 8.
flavorText: How to kill a kayran? Simple! Take your best sword… then sell it, and hire a witcher.
name: Kayran

description: Choose up to 2 cards in your opponent's graveyard and randomly place them in your opponent's deck. For each card chosen, lose 1 strength.
flavorText: Nilfgaardian mages do have a choice: servile submission, or the gallows.
name: Assire var Anahid

description: Add 4 strength to a non-Gold unit in your hand.
flavorText: Most terrible things I've witnessed? The Catriona plague, the razing of Vengerberg and the charge of the Vrihedd Dragoons.
name: Vrihedd Dragoon

description: At the end of every turn, reset all other non-Gold units on the row to base strength.
flavorText: I know how to execute orders, so take your advice somewhere else.
name: Dennis Cranmer

description: Lose 2 strength at the start of your turn. When removed from the battlefield, spawn Craven Revived on the same row.
flavorText: Strike his name from the Saga of Elders! No one dare grant him shelter or sustenance!
name: Skjall

description: Remove 1 base strength from all opposing non-Gold units. When removed, add 2 strength to all non-Gold units on the battlefield.
flavorText: One of four bosses who control the city's underworld - the others being Sigi Reuven, Carlo ""The Cleaver"" Varese and the King of Beggars.
name: Cyprian Wiley

description: Play a Blue Stripes Commando from your deck whenever a Gold card appears on your side.
flavorText: Better to live one day as a king than a whole life as a beggar.
name: Ves

description: Destroy an opposing non-Gold unit. Remove an amount equal to that unit's strength from a random non-Gold unit on your side.
flavorText: How much is a human life worth? That depends. Yours, for instance, I'd put at about a hundred orens.
name: Assassination

description: Banish a random non-Gold unit in either graveyard and absorb its strength.
flavorText: If ghouls are part of the Circle of Life… then it's one vicious circle.
name: Ghoul

description: Immune to Weather. Spawn a Frost effect and 2 Wild Hunt Hounds.
flavorText: A favorite son who chose a life of villainy.
name: Caranthir

description: Every 2 turns, at the end of the turn destroy the weakest non-Gold unit on the row (except self) and absorb its strength.
flavorText: They sat still on their horses, seemingly relaxed. He saw their weapons – short spears with wide tips. Swords with oddly forged guards. Battle axes. Toothed gisarmes.
name: Vran Warrior

description: No ability.
flavorText: Learned a lot at Braibant Military Academy. How to scrub potatoes, for instance.
name: Daerlan Foot Soldiers

description: Add 2 to the base strength of a non-Gold unit in your graveyard (can be Permadeath), then resurrect it.
flavorText: Those cursed sorceresses are stealing our thunder! Whyever should folk choose a procedure taking several hours, when some perfumed tart can solve their problem with a wave of her hand?
name: Restore

description: Play Eskel and Vesemir from your deck.
flavorText: Now that's the kind of negotiating I understand.
name: Lambert

description: Remove 5 strength from a Spying non-Gold unit on either side of the battlefield. If the unit was destroyed, gain {bst1} base strength.
flavorText: They call us Death's Heads. Care to find out why?
name: Nauzicaa Brigade

description: Resurrect a Gold unit (can be Permadeath).
flavorText: Medicus curat, magicae sanat.
name: Renew

description: Gain 1 strength whenever a revealed unit appears on the opposing side.
flavorText: I fight for whoever's paying the best. Or whoever's easiest to rob.
name: Hawker Smuggler

description: Destroy a non-Gold unit. If it was on the opposing side, your opponent draws a card and reveals it. If it was on your side, draw and play a card. If your opponent has passed, you may only target a unit on your side.
flavorText: We are all pawns on his board. Playing a game whose rules we do not know.
name: Vilgefortz

description: Banish a non-Gold unit in either graveyard and absorb its strength.
flavorText: Drinking the blood of the Continent since the Conjunction.
name: Katakan

description: Spawn 3 base copies of a Breedable unit on your side of the battlefield.
flavorText: Damn, the filth's o'errun us… We need a witcher or there's no livin' 'ere!
name: Monster Nest
